title: City Of Rocks National Reserve: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Visitor Center offers information, orientation video, books, apparel, maps and souvenirs National Park Service  Visitor Center Currently, the visitor center is open daily, 7 days a week, 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., including holidays through Saturday, October 22, 2016. Beginning, Tuesday, October 25, 2016, the visitor center is open 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Tuesdays through Saturdays (closed Sunday, Monday, and federal winter holidays).  The visitor center will return to seven days a week beginning Tuesday, April 11, 2017.
